sentences.sContent: She stood there with her hands on her hips glaring at him.
sentences.sCn: 她站在那里，双手叉腰瞪着他。

sentences.sContent: The old lady had fallen and broken her hip.
sentences.sCn: 那老妇人摔了一跤，髋部骨折。

phrases.pCn: n. 嘻哈文化（由快板歌、涂墙艺术、霹雳舞等构成的亚文化）

words.tran: 着迷的；忧抑的；（牲畜等）股关节脱节的；（屋顶）有斜脊的
世面灵通的人；赶时髦的人；颓废派成员（等于beatnik）
使知晓；使警觉（hip的过去分词）

trans.tranOther: one of the two parts on each side of your body between the top of your leg and your waist
